body_html:
I don't really think import_pb_to_tensorboard solves the issue here: 1) firstly, model_dir takes a graph.pb, instead of a saved_model.pb; 2) what is it with "log_idr"?

On a separate note: I think TF folks could've done a much better job handling RFEs from users, instead of just keeping on closing them.

body:
I don't really think import_pb_to_tensorboard solves the issue here: 1) firstly, model_dir takes a graph.pb, instead of a saved_model.pb; 2) what is it with "log_idr"?

On a separate note: I think TF folks could've done a much better job handling RFEs from users, instead of just keeping on closing them.
